claim: Flublok is approved for adults 18 years and older
explanation: The image is a screenshot of the FDA-approved prescribing information for Flublok Quadrivalent.  In the section labeled “Indications and Usage,” it explicitly states that Flublok is indicated for “active immunization against influenza virus in persons 18 years of age and older.”  This directly confirms that Flublok is approved for use in adults aged 18 years and up, fully supporting the claim.
